exits.Ganons Castle Tower:
(skipped_trials[Forest] or Forest_Trial_Clear) and 
                (skipped_trials[Fire] or Fire_Trial_Clear) and 
                (skipped_trials[Water] or Water_Trial_Clear) and 
                (skipped_trials[Shadow] or Shadow_Trial_Clear) and 
                (skipped_trials[Spirit] or Spirit_Trial_Clear) and 
                (skipped_trials[Light] or Light_Trial_Clear)

locations.Ganons Castle Fire Trial Clear:
has_GoronTunic and can_use(Golden_Gauntlets) and 
                can_use(Light_Arrows) and (can_use(Longshot) or Hover_Boots)

locations.Ganons Castle MQ Shadow Trial First Ches:
(has_bow and (Progressive_Hookshot or Hover_Boots)) or 
                (Hover_Boots and can_see_with_lens and 
                    (has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or can_use(Dins_Fire)))
locations.Ganons Castle MQ Shadow Trial Second Che:
has_bow and can_see_with_lens and 
                (Hover_Boots or (Progressive_Hookshot and has_fire_source))
locations.Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Clear:
can_use(Light_Arrows) and can_see_with_lens and 
                (Hover_Boots or (Progressive_Hookshot and has_fire_source))

locations.Ganons Castle MQ Spirit Trial Second Che:
(has_bow or logic_rusted_switches) and Hammer and 
                has_bombchus and can_see_with_lens
locations.Ganons Castle MQ Spirit Trial Sun Front:
Hammer and has_bombchus and 
                can_use(Fire_Arrows) and Mirror_Shield
locations.Ganons Castle MQ Spirit Trial Sun Back L:
Hammer and has_bombchus and 
                can_use(Fire_Arrows) and Mirror_Shield
locations.Ganons Castle MQ Spirit Trial Golden Gau:
Hammer and has_bombchus and 
                can_use(Fire_Arrows) and Mirror_Shield
locations.Ganons Castle MQ Spirit Trial Sun Back R:
Hammer and has_bombchus and 
                can_use(Fire_Arrows) and Mirror_Shield
locations.Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Clear:
can_use(Light_Arrows) and Hammer and 
                has_bombchus and Fire_Arrows and Mirror_Shield
